name: Improved Tic Tac Toe
description:
Wanted to make a very simple game to dive back into Unity. It has been a long break.

Improved Tic Tac Toe adds a little more complexity to tic tac toe. If you place a small circle, then the medium X or the large X can take your spot! Use your pieces wisely as you only have 2 of each.

This is a 2 player game with no AI (sorry) made in 7hrs for the GDL July 21 gamejam.
Grab someone in your house and give it a go!

Player 1 goes first and must first click a circle piece and then click a square on the board. Then it is player 2's turn.

Click play again to restart.
